about.title: About Haushub
about.description: Life gets busy. Sometimes you need a helping hand – or face a challenge you simply don't know how to solve. Even more, there are times when you're not sure who the right expert is for the job. That's where Haushub comes in.
about.founded: Founded by Sarantis Adamantidis, a seasoned electrician and system integrator, Haushub is designed to bridge the gap between the everyday tasks that need doing and the complex challenges that require innovative solutions.

story.title: Why Haushub Exists
story.description: Founded by Sarantis Adamantidis, Haushub bridges the gap between everyday tasks and complex technical challenges. We believe everyone deserves reliable, professional service without the hassle.

sarantis.title: About Sarantis
sarantis.subtitle: Sarantis Adamantidis – Electrician, System Integrator, and Solution-Oriented Professional.
sarantis.experience: With over 15 years of experience across Athens and Zürich, Sarantis combines technical expertise in electrical installations, smart home systems, and facility management with a passion for problem-solving.
sarantis.certifications: His certifications, including KNX smart automation, are backed by a career marked by precision, reliability, and a commitment to client satisfaction.
sarantis.creativity: Sarantis' creativity is fueled not only by his professional journey but also by a lifestyle rich in exploration, diverse projects, and global perspectives.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I book a service?
faq.a1: Simply call or WhatsApp us at +41 788 066 762, or send an email to info@haushub.ch. We'll discuss your needs and schedule a convenient time.
faq.a2: We serve Zürich, Rapperswil, and the surrounding regions. For locations outside this area, additional travel costs may apply.
faq.q3: Are materials included in the hourly rate?
faq.a3: No, materials and VAT are charged separately from our hourly rates. We'll provide a transparent quote including all costs.
faq.q4: What happens if I need a specialist for a bigger project?
faq.a4: Haushub coordinates trusted specialists through our established network, providing seamless oversight and quality results for larger projects.
